derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (denoting a membrane of the body): from Latin cuticula, diminutive of cutis 'skin'

entry.def: Your cuticles are the skin at the base of each of your fingernails.

means.word_mean: 1. the outer layer of the skin covering the exterior body surface of vertebrates
2. hard outer covering or case of certain organisms such as arthropods and turtles

auth_sentence.content: The rigid cuticle inhibits growth, so arthropods replace it periodically by moulting.
